description: This file defines a React component for a Tic Tac Toe game, managing game state, rendering the game board, handling user interactions, and displaying game status and reset functionality.

methods.name: calculateWinner
methods.description: Calculates the winner of the current game based on the current state of the board.

methods.name: handleClick
methods.description: Handles user clicks on a game square, updating game state, and checking for a win or draw.

methods.name: resetGame
methods.description: Resets the game to its initial state.

methods.name: renderSquare
methods.description: Renders an individual square button of the game board.

methods.name: getStatusMessage
methods.description: Provides the current game status message, including winner or ongoing player.
